column1: Baby Barnaby's////Their menu consists of typical brunch items but my number one fave would be the green eggs!  Unless you've had 'em
column2: you have no idea how often I crave these when I'm back home.  Freshly squeezed OJ
column5: steak 'n eggs ... their menu is simply divine!  Their menu is small
column6: but completely filling and offers enough variety (in my opinion).
